data.title: Razan Prassas
data.text: Razan Prassas (New York) joined KKR in 2022 as a Managing Director in Global Client Solutions. Ms. Prassas covers institutional investors in the U.S. Central Region and focuses on the firmâ€™s real estate platform. Prior to joining KKR, she spent sixteen years at Brookfield Asset Management, where she was responsible for institutional capital raising and consultant relations in the U.S., Canada and the Middle East across a number of real asset strategies. Previously, Ms. Prassas was a real estate securities analyst and investment research associate at Heitman. She holds a Master of Business Administration in International Marketing and Finance from DePaul University and a Bachelor of Science in Finance from Miami University.
